pages.page:
I.7. The Faculty Development Program
provides for the following:
I.7.4. de-loading of faculty to finish
master’s/doctoral degrees;

Republic of the Philippines CAVITE STATE UNIVERSITY Tanza ǀ Trece Martires City ǀ Gen. Trias City Campus  235-7997 ǀ  410-5247 ǀ  437-0693 www.cvsu.edu.ph
May 20, 2019
PROF. NOEL A. SEDIGO Campus Administrator CvSU Tanza
Dear Prof. Sedigo:
I am grateful for the many opportunities you have provided me since I became part of the institution for eleven years now. As member of the academe, I acknowledge the importance of continuing education in pursuit for excellence especially in the area of instruction and research as two of my core functions as academician. In this regard, I am currently pursuing my PhD in Mathematics Education at the Philippine Normal University. I am currently enrolled in my dissertation writing (DW1) and defended my concept paper for this purpose.
In line with this, I would like to request your good office to allow me to handle just 12 units in instruction this First Semester AY 2019-2020 for me to devote more time in my Dissertation proposal defense which I planned to present before the Second Semester of AY 2019-2020 and hopefully could conduct the data gathering part immediately after so that I could finish my degree within the prescribed time.
I am hoping that this request grants your favorable approval.
Thank you very much.
Very truly yours,
MILDRED A. SEBASTIAN Asst. Professor I
Recommending Approval:
CRIS ALBERT P. CAJIGAS Campus Coordinator
Approved:
NOEL A. SEDIGO Campus Administrator

Republic of the Philippines CAVITE STATE UNIVERSITY Tanza ǀ Trece Martires City ǀ Gen. Trias City Campus  235-7997 ǀ  410-5247 ǀ  437-0693 www.cvsu.edu.ph
May 20, 2018
PROF. NOEL A. SEDIGO Campus Administrator CvSU Tanza
Dear Prof. Sedigo:
The undersigned is currently taking Master of Information Technology at the Technological University of Philippines and in the final stage of my thesis writing to finish the program.
In this regard, I would like to request your good office to allow me to handle just 9 units of lecture-laboratory (equivalent to 15hours of teaching) this First Semester AY 2018-2019 so I can devote more time in the implementation stage of my thesis study.
I am hoping that this request merits your utmost consideration.
Thank you very much.
Very truly yours,
CHARMAINE T. BANAG Instructor I
Recommending Approval:
JOYCE ERIKA S. SENARIS NOEL B. MANARPIIS, PhD Department Chair, DIT Campus Coordinator
Approved:
NOEL A. SEDIGO Campus Administrator
